articles.author: SAMY MAGDY Associated Press
articles.title: Refugees shot dead in Tripoli forced out of UN facility
articles.description: Two Eritrean asylum-seekers were shot dead inside their accommodation in the Libyan capital Tripoli, days after the UN Refugee Agency pressed them to leave its facility citing overcrowdings
articles.content:
KHARTOUM, Sudan -- 
Two Eritrean asylum-seekers were shot dead in the Libyan capital, Tripoli, days after the U.N. refugee agency pressed them to leave its facility citing overcrowding.
The UNHCR confirmed the deaths in a statement Friday saying it's deeply… [+686 chars]

articles.title: India demolishes buildings for violating environmental norms
articles.description: Authorities in southern Kerala state have razed down two high-rise luxury apartments using controlled implosion in one of the largest demolition drives in India
articles.content:
KOCHI, India -- 
Authorities in southern Kerala state on Saturday razed down two high-rise luxury apartments using controlled implosion in one of the largest demolition drives in India involving residential complexes for violating environmental norms.

articles.title: Oman names culture minister as successor to Sultan Qaboos
articles.description: Oman announced Saturday that culture minister Haitham bin Tariq Al Said has been named as the new ruler of the country and the successor to Sultan Qaboos
articles.content:
DUBAI, United Arab Emirates -- 
Oman announced Saturday that culture minister Haitham bin Tariq Al Said has been named as the new ruler of the Arabian country and the successor to longtime ruler Sultan Qaboos.

articles.title: Alcohol-related deaths in US have doubled since 1999: Study
articles.description: Alcohol-related deaths in US have doubled since 1999: Study go.com
articles.content:
Alcohol-related deaths in the United States have doubled among people at least 16 years old since 1999, according to a new study.

articles.title: N Korea: Trump's birthday greet not enough to resume talks
articles.description: A North Korean official says the U.S. and South Korea are dreaming if they think that President Donald Trump's sending a birthday message would get leader Kim Jong Un back to the negotiating table

articles.content:
DUBAI, United Arab Emirates -- 
Oman state TV says Haitham bin Tariq Al Said is Oman's new sultan after the death of longtime ruler Qaboos bin Said.
